snippet: Mike Leake allowed three hits and struck out 10 in eight innings, and Jay Bruce homered in the second inning to help the Cincinnati Reds beat the Marlins.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Cincinnati Reds defeat Miami Marlins, 1-0; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Mike Leake allowed three hits and struck out 10 in eight innings, and Jay Bruce homered in the second inning to help the Cincinnati Reds beat the Marlins.

headline.print_headline: Strong Pitching Performance Helps Reds Edge the Marlins
headline.main: Strong Pitching Performance Helps Reds Edge the Marlins
